channel.title: Computational modelling on Wise Lab Wiki
channel.description: Recent content in Computational modelling on Wise Lab Wiki

item.title: General best practices
item.description: Building models If possible, build models using JAX Make sure code is modular and well-documented Components that could be reused should be made into functions Contribute model code to behavioural_modelling if appropriate Fitting models See this paper for some useful advice on fitting models
